content: this pattern is written as a tutorial for a first in-the-round knitting project for someone who already knows how to knit and purl to make this hat you ll need one 16 circular needle in size us 5 one 16 circular needle in size us 6 and one set of double pointed needles also in size us 6 ideas are also given for modification such as making the pattern slouchier or the decrease more gathered and it is also suitable for more advanced knitters
